original_text: in order that search may be made in the book of the records of your fathers. You will find in the book of the records and learn that this city is a rebellious city, hurtful to kings and provinces, and that sedition was stirred up in it from of old. That was why this city was laid waste.
korean_text: 왕은 조상들의 사기를 살펴보시면 그 사기에서 이 성읍은 패역한 성읍이라 예로부터 그 중에서 항상 반역하는 일을 행하여 왕들과 각 도에 손해가 된 것을 보시고 아실지라 이 성읍이 무너짐도 이 때문이니이다

sentences.original_text: in order that search may be made
in the book of the records
You will find in the book of the records
and learn that this city is a rebellious city
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 도시가 반역적인 도시라는 것을 배울 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and that sedition was stirred up
That was why this city was laid waste
